hooks.name: format-on-edit
hooks.description: Run black and isort on edited Python files

hooks.name: lint-check-on-edit
hooks.description: Check for flake8 lint errors after Python edits

hooks.name: typecheck-on-edit
hooks.description: Run mypy on edited files to catch type errors

hooks.name: pre-commit-quality-gate
hooks.description: Full quality check before git commits
hooks.command: if echo "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" | grep -qE 'git commit'; then flake8 src/ tests/ && mypy src/ --ignore-missing-imports; fi
